effects: Inflict one random status effect (20%) to all enemies

desc_short: Randomly poison, blind, put to sleep, silence, paralyze, confuse, disease, or petrify all enemies
對全體敵人隨機施加異常狀態
적 전체에 무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 부여
Inflige au hasard poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala., ou pétri. sur tous les ennemis
Fügt zuf. Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille0, Betäubung, Konfus, Virus oder Stein hinzu, alle Gegner.
Inflige al azar ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf o pie a todos los enemigos
desc_long: Randomly inflict poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone on all enemies.
對1名敵人隨機施加異常狀態。
적 전체에 무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 부여합니다.
Inflige au hasard poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie, ou pétrification à tous les ennemis.
Fügt allen Gegnern zuf. Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein zu.
Inflige al azar veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad o piedra a todos los enemigos.
